document.masterDocTitle: Notes on the tiger beetles (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Cicindelinae) of Vietnam. 135. Contribution towards the knowledge of Cicindelinae

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Notes on the tiger beetles (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Cicindelinae) of Vietnam. 135. Contribution towards the knowledge of Cicindelinae

subSubSection.paragraph: Published data. NORTHEAST: Lao Cai (Sa Pa) ( Horn 1929: 18 ).

New records.

Distribution. Vietnam ( Bac Kan , Gia Lai , Hoa Binh , Kon Tum , Lao Cai , Ninh Binh , Phu Tho , Thai Nguyen , Thua Thien-Hue , Tuyen Quang , Vinh Phuc ), China ( Yunnan ), Laos ( Borikhamxay , Houaphanh , Luangnamtha , Oudomxay , Phongsaly ), India ( Assam ).
Remarks. New provincial records for Bac Kan , Gia Lai , Hoa Binh , Kon Tum , Ninh Binh , Phu Tho , Thai Nguyen , Thua Thien-Hue , Tuyen Quang , and Vinh Phuc .
